projects.name: Atlas OS
projects.description: A custom operating system built using React for the frontend, utilizing Tailwind CSS for design and a MERN stack for backend infrastructure. Aimed at providing a smooth user interface and robust performance.

projects.name: profile
projects.description: A personal portfolio website built using Next.js and styled with Chakra UI, demonstrating TypeScript proficiency and showcasing various development projects.

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time chat application using Socket.io for instant communication, with a Node.js and Express backend, and MongoDB for data persistence.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: An e-commerce platform built with Vue.js and Vuetify for a sleek user interface, with Firebase handling backend services like authentication and database storage.

projects.name: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: A social media analytics dashboard built using Angular, with state management handled by NgRx and styled using Sass for a clean and responsive design.
